summary: This document contains a series of financial transactions involving JEGE, LLC, and various entities, primarily payments made to the Port Authority of NY & NJ, World Fuel Services, and individuals such as William J. DiMauro and Charles Pickett III. The transactions are dated between 2016 and 2017 and include details such as amounts, dates, and memo notes for services rendered.
